exercise.title: 03.07 Eclipse IDE

p.i: IDE (Integrated Development Environment) is single software application in which all development is done. Typically, an IDE provides a single user interface for managing source codes and other files, servers, browsers and other programmer's tools that speed up the development work.

exercise.p:
Start Eclipse. Enter M:\osdw\eclipse_workspace as the workspace name. Close the Welcome tab. Create a new project in Eclipse as follows: File > New > Projectâ€¦ > General > Project Click on Next Enter MyFirstEclipseProject as the project name and click on Finish. Create the following two folders in the project: css and js In the Project Explorer tab, right-click on the project name New > Folder Create three new files (general.css, main.js, myPage.html) as below. Copy/paste the following code to the file myPage.html: My Page

Hello

Copy/paste the following code to the file general.css: #myTitle { color: #0055AA; } Copy/paste the following code to the file main.js: document.getElementById("myTitle").innerHTML += ", World!"; View the HTML page in web browser as follows: In Project Explorer, right-click on the file name myPage.html Select Open with > Web Browser Finally, take a screenshot. Save the screenshot to M:\public_html and submit a link to the screenshot.
